data.answer: Hello! Welcome to Halcom. I am your virtual assistant. How can I help you with our IT Infrastructure solutions today?

Halcom is an IT Infrastructure Specialist established on June 18, 2003, in Batam. We have over 20 years of experience providing total solutions with expert certified teams for enterprise and government segments. We focus on IT Infrastructure, IT Consulting, Industrial Automation, and Mechanical & Electrical services.

We offer four main lines of business: 1) IT Infrastructure Specialist (Hardwares, Softwares, Project Management), 2) Managed Services (Preventive Maintenance), 3) Mechanical & Electrical (Design & Installation), and 4) Industrial Automation (Manual to Automated transformation).
As an IT Infrastructure Specialist, we provide optimal solutions including IT hardware and software, project management, installation, testing, and training tailored to your business needs.
We provide comprehensive cloud infrastructure services and seamless migration from legacy systems to modern cloud environments, optimizing your business efficiency.
Our Network solutions offer advanced networking architecture with 24/7 monitoring and performance management to ensure business continuity.
We provide enterprise-grade security solutions, including security audits and compliance implementation, ensuring your business meets international standards.
Halcom transforms manual or semi-automatic processes into complete sets of automated processes, allowing your industry to achieve efficient results.
We provide design, supervision, and installation of electrical and mechanical works for facilities such as office buildings, hotels, airports, and manufacturing plants.

Choose Halcom for our Expert Teams (20+ years experience), Financial Stability (supported by HSBC and Mandiri), Strategic Partnerships with global technology leaders, and our commitment to providing Total Solutions.

We partner with global industry leaders including Cisco, Huawei, Dell EMC (Gold Partner), Allied Telesis (Platinum Partner), HPE (Silver Partner), VMware (Enterprise Partner), APC, Honeywell, and Samsung.
Halcom is recognized with ISO 45001:2018 (Occupational Health & Safety), ISO 9001:2015 (Quality Management), and PLN Certification, validating our expertise and commitment to excellence.
Our leadership includes Ahmad Wijaya (CEO - 25+ years exp), Budi Santoso (Technical Director - Cloud Expert), Siti Nurhaliza (Operations Manager), and Rudi Hermawan (Senior Solutions Architect).
